body:
- Fixed older maps with dart/alpha pads not loading
- Fixed desert wastes zone not loading on older devices [Android]
- Fixed game freezing instead of freezing in certain situations
- Fixed recipe tree info box disappearing on click
- Fixed liquid source outputting water for the first frame
- Fixed liquid junction taking in liquids regardless of output status
- Fixed some obscure crashes
- Removed camera clamp [Mobile]
- Added unstable borderless window option [Desktop]
- Added liquid source no-liquid mode
- Tweaked drill priority algorithm to prefer scrap and coal over sand regardless of proportions
- Made nearly all power blocks work with partial power, albeit at reduced efficiency
- Changed default mech to dart
name: v4 Build 74 - Beta
